Projects.title: EduQuest
desc: EduQuest is an innovative educational platform that transforms traditional learning into an engaging, gamified experience.
Using ASP.NET as backend and Angular as frontend, it provides interactive course management, personalized learning paths, and comprehensive assessment tools.

The platform serves educational institutions, instructors, and students by combining game mechanics like quests and achievement badges with robust learning management system capabilities, making education more motivating and effective through technology-driven solutions.

Projects.title: Stock Manager
desc: A Stock management desktop app using C
Modify prices, add products, manage quantities

Projects.title: Parking
desc: Parking is a web application that specialized in parking reservation online
Using Spring Boot with MVC architecture, it provides an interactive parking management

Projects.title: BlueBoy Adventure 2D
desc: A 2D open world game, created from scratch using only java
An interactive fun 2D game with multiple maps, using small AI algorithm for the npcs and monsters movements
Level Rank up with experience points and health hearts

Projects.title: Animal Adoption App
desc: a complete mobile solution using Ionic Angular and Firebase that streamlines the pet adoption process. The application features dual user roles (shelters and adopters), real-time animal listings, adoption request management, push notifications, and location-based services.

Key technical achievements include implementing secure authentication flows, optimizing image storage using base64 encoding to eliminate external dependencies, and ensuring cross-platform compatibility through Capacitor integration.
